Job Description:
Senior Data Engineer
$180k
Join a multi-disciplined and highly motivated team of Software Developers, Data Engineers & Data Scientist. You will be responsible for the Data Warehouse Infrastructure and working with all the functional departments within the business.
Role & Responsibilities:
Create and maintain Data Pipeline Architecture
Assemble large and complex data sets
ETL infrastructure for multiple data sources using SQL & AWS tools & technologies
Data Security
Work with Data Scientists on creating tools for Analytics
Some Skills & Qualifications: (flexible on skillset)
Expert SQL and RDBMS experience
Building Data architecture & pipelines
Working on structured & unstructured data
Build Processes, Stream Processing, Data transformation & workload management.
AWS
Python
Don't have the skills above? I'd still be keen for a chat in regards to other opportunities.
This would be a great time to join this team as they are looking to expand even further.
If you are looking for an excellent salary, flexible working, ongoing training, and career progression then this is the job for you.
